question: World Chess Championship 2021: Will there be tiebreaks?
description:
The World Chess Championship 2021 is an ongoing chess match between reigning world champion Magnus Carlsen and challenger Ian Nepomniachtchi to determine the World Chess Champion. 

The full regular match consists of 14 games, played from November 24 to December 14, and a score of 7½ wins the world championship.

If the score is equal after 14 games, tie-break games with faster time controls will be played and this market will resolve to "Yes".

If tie-breaks do not occur, this market will resolve "No".

------------------------------

WCC 2021 is held under the auspices of FIDE, the world chess federation, and played at Dubai Exhibition Centre, Dubai, United Arab Emirates, between 24 November and 16 December 2021.

Please read more about the championship here: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/World_Chess_Championship_2021

question: Will Donald Trump be President of the USA on December 31, 2021?
description:
This is a market on if Donald Trump will be President of the United States on December 31, 2021, 11:59 PM ET. 

This market will resolve to “Yes“ if, on the resolution date, Donald Trump is the current President of the United States, officially substantiated by official US government sources, like the links provided as the resolution source. 

If, for any reason, Donald Trump is not the sitting President of the United States on that date, this market will resolve to “No". 

The resolution sources are: 
1. https://www.loc.gov/rr/print/list/057_chron.html, 
2. https://history.house.gov/Institution/Presidents-Coinciding/Presidents-Coinciding/ 
and 3. https://www.whitehouse.gov/. 
 
If any of these 3 sources list Donald Trump officially as the current sitting president on the resolution date, this market will resolve to "Yes". Otherwise, the market will resolve to "No."

question: Will Vice President Harris cast 15 or more tie-breaking votes in 2021?
description:
This is a market on whether Kamala Harris will cast 15 or more tie-breaking votes in 2021. 

The market will resolve to “Yes” if Kamala Harris casts 15 or more tie-breaking votes in 2021, and “No” otherwise. 

Tie-breaking votes will be considered if they are cast on or before 11:59 PM ET, December 31, 2021. 

The resolution source will be https://www.senate.gov/legislative/TieVotes.htm. 

If the link changes or becomes unavailable, or is not updated with the most recent tie-breaking votes cast by the resolution time, another credible source will be chosen.

question: NFL: Will the Falcons beat the Jaguars by more than 2.5 points in their November 28th matchup?
description:
In the upcoming NFL game, scheduled for November 28th:

If the Atlanta Falcons win by over 2.5 points, the market will resolve to “Yes”.

If the Jacksonville Jaguars lose by less than 2.5 points or win, the market will resolve “No.”

question: NFL: Will the sum of points in Chargers v Broncos be an even or an odd number?
description:

If the total sum of points scored is an even number (ie. score is 27-21, 19-9, 10-30...), this market will resolve to “Even”.

If the total sum of points scored is an odd number (ie. score is 32-13, 29-40, 24-17...), this market will resolve to “Odd”.
